root['Kit']['Skill']['Desc'].new_value: Restores HP to Garmentmaker by [25|50|55]% of its Max HP. If Garmentmaker is absent, summons the memosprite Garmentmaker and this unit immediately takes action.
root['Kit']['Skill']['Desc'].old_value: Restores HP to Garmentmaker by [25|50|55]% of its Max HP. If Garmentmaker is absent, summons the memosprite Garmentmaker, and this unit immediately takes action.

root['Kit']['Talent']['Desc'].new_value: The memosprite Garmentmaker has an initial SPD equal to 35% of Aglaea's SPD and a Max HP equal to [44|66|70.4]% of Aglaea's Max HP plus [180|720|828]. While Garmentmaker is on the field, Aglaea's attacks inflict the target with the 'Seam Stitch' state. After attacking enemies in the 'Seam Stitch' state, further deals Lightning Additional DMG equal to [12|30|33.6]% of Aglaea's ATK. 'Seam Stitch' only takes effect on the most recently inflicted target.
root['Kit']['Talent']['Desc'].old_value: The memosprite Garmentmaker has an initial SPD equal to 35% of Aglaea's SPD and a Max HP equal to [44|66|70.4]% of Aglaea's Max HP plus [180|720|828]. While Garmentmaker is on the field, Aglaea's attacks inflict the target with the 'Seam Stitch' state. After attacking enemies in the 'Seam Stitch' state, further deals Additional DMG equal to [12|30|33.6]% of Aglaea's ATK. 'Seam Stitch' only takes effect on the most recently inflicted target.

root['Eidolons']['1']['Desc'].new_value: Enemies afflicted with 'Seam Stitch' take 15% increased DMG. After Aglaea or Garmentmaker attacks this target, Aglaea additionally regenerates 20 Energy.
root['Eidolons']['1']['Desc'].old_value: When Aglaea or Garmentmaker takes action, the DMG dealt by Aglaea and Garmentmaker ignores 15% of the target's DEF. This effect stacks up to 20 time(s) and lasts until any unit, other than Aglaea or Garmentmaker, actively uses an ability.

root['Eidolons']['2']['Desc'].new_value: When Aglaea or Garmentmaker takes action, the DMG dealt by Aglaea and Garmentmaker ignores 14% of the target's DEF. This effect stacks up to 3 time(s) and lasts until any unit, other than Aglaea or Garmentmaker, actively uses an ability.
root['Eidolons']['2']['Desc'].old_value: Enemies afflicted with 'Seam Stitch' take 14% increased DMG. After Aglaea or Garmentmaker attacks this target, Aglaea additionally regenerates 3 Energy.
